Six Usability Goals & Design Principles

Six Usability Goalsï¼š

Effectivenessã€Efficiencyã€Safetyã€Learnabilityã€Memorabilityã€Utility.

Efficiencyï¼šHow fast / How many step to use the product?
Safety: Easy or not to make mistakes, easy or not to recover, (user canâ€™t do right things always)
Learnability: How easy is a system to learn how to use.
Memorability: How easy to remember how to use a product after learning how to use it?

Design Principlesï¼š

Visibilityã€feedbackã€constraintsã€consistencyã€affordance.

Visibility: Make all feature visible.
Feedback: Provide the information about current statement
Constraints: Stop people from it.
Consistency: What we expect.

è®¾è®¡éš¾ç‚¹

You canâ€™t be told how to design.
Donâ€™t be afraid of making the mistakes;
Learn from the mistakes;
use more than 20~30% time to try;
